sum: Proficient in Python programming with a strong foundation in essential libraries including ('xlrd, pandas, and MySQL ')for data manipulation and analysis.

Experienced in developing Telegram bots using telegram.ext framework, with a notable achievement of creating a personalized bot capable of efficiently retrieving images from an album based on user requests.
Eager to contribute these skills to projects that require data handling and interactive bot development.

Demonstrated expertise in running a JavaScript runtime environment called Node.js, along with its fundamental libraries such as (' node-scheduler, cors, jsonwebtoken, cookie-parser, and body-parser ').
Possess excellent proficiency in utilizing Express.js in conjunction with Node.js to establish backend server-side responses.
Experienced in the complete software development lifecycle, encompassing design, development, testing, production support, and administration.
Extensive hands-on experience in web design utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for client-side development
Proficient in designing interfaces for web applications using Figma.
Solid comprehension of React and its core methods, including (' props, filter, map, etc., ')with a proven track record of working on diverse API projects.
Adept at utilizing VS Code as the preferred development environment for project work.
Experienced in interface development for web applications using JavaScript.
Proficiently managed SQL databases, excelling in query formulation using MySQL Workbench. also in database creation, and database management.
Proficient in handling JSON files for seamless object transfer across various environments.
Demonstrated excellence in creating JSON Servers containing data objects.
Successfully managed concurrent projects effectively and efficiently.
Contributed to various production maintenance, Go Live, and disaster management activities.
Possesses foundational knowledge of MS Excel, master data integration, and API management.
